Name: Faye/Sleepwalker
About the game: 'When you are flying in the sky of a vast world, swimming in the sea, defeating enemies, or searching for your roots, what do you really know...?' Faye/Sleepwalker is a vast world of exploration and hectic battles. Enjoy a high speed action game and the development of an interesting story in an open world. Battles are divided into two modes, a normal mode with easy control of actions, and the sleepwalk mode with high-speed actions and warp attacks, allowing you to experience new sensations of actions. ■Combo ■Battle ■Quest
